title: Subete ga F ni Naru: The Perfect Insider
title_jp: すべてがFになる THE PERFECT INSIDER
synopsis: Genius programmer Shiki Magata has been living in isolation at a research facility on a solitary island since she was a girl. Nagono University associate professor Souhei Saikawa and Moe Nishinosono wish to meet Shiki in person, so they visit the facility but get caught up in a murderous game.
